name: Abaq.us
overview:
Abaq.us delivers Abaq.us GeoWeb Services, a comprehensive, hosted platform for both location-based social and business applications. Its extensible, software as a service (SaaS) architecture provides users with the ability to store, visualize, analyze, and utilize data from a variety of GPS-enabled mobile devices.

GeoWeb Services are ideal for businessesâ€”including device OEMs, vehicle brands, travel and adventure web content publishers and social networks, as well as small-to-medium-sized businesses (SMBs)â€”to rapidly and affordably launch location-based user communities and applications online to more effectively interact with their customers.

With its accessible application programming interfaces (APIs) and widgets, developers can use the hosted service to leverage geospatial data across any custom application on the web.

Abaq.us also powers myGeoDiary (http://www.mygeodiary.com), a consumer service that allows users to easily and safely organize, personalize and share their geotagged tracks & multimedia content across any site on the web using any GPS-enabled devices.

Abaq.us is headquartered in Sunnyvale, CA.
